name: Zendesk AI Support Agent
description: Enterprise customer support AI agent integrated with Zendesk, providing automated ticket triage, sentiment analysis, response generation, and escalation management for multi-channel support operations

skills.name: Ticket Triage & Classification
skills.description: Automatically categorize, prioritize, and route incoming support tickets based on content, urgency, and customer tier using ML classification
examples: Classify this ticket: 'My payment was charged twice'
Route ticket to appropriate team based on content
Determine priority level for: 'Production system is down'

skills.name: Customer Sentiment Analysis
skills.description: Analyze customer sentiment in tickets and conversations to identify frustrated customers needing immediate attention
examples: Analyze sentiment of this customer conversation
Identify escalation risk based on customer tone
Track sentiment trend over ticket history

skills.name: Automated Response Generation
skills.description: Generate contextually appropriate responses using customer history, knowledge base articles, and previous successful resolutions
examples: Draft a response for password reset request
Generate resolution steps for this issue type
Create a follow-up message for resolved ticket

skills.name: Escalation Prediction
skills.description: Predict which tickets are likely to require escalation to senior agents or managers based on historical patterns
examples: Predict escalation probability for this ticket

skills.name: Knowledge Base Search
skills.description: Search and retrieve relevant articles from the knowledge base to assist agents and provide self-service options to customers
examples: Find articles about two-factor authentication setup
Search for troubleshooting steps for error code 5001
